title: 84x13: Applicability of Conflict of Interest Statutes to Special Government Employees
summary: Attorney did not qualify for certain limited restrictions of 18 U.S.C. §§ 203 and 205 for SGEs because he served more than 60 days in the preceding 365 day period.  Because he was an SGE, 18 U.S.C. § 209 did not apply to him.  18 U.S.C. § 207(a) and (b)(i) would apply after termination, but 18 U.S.C. § 207(b)(ii) and (c) did not apply.
